Abjad

Easy way to learn the Arabic alphabet (Abjadiyah) for preschoolers

Awladuna Oct 31, 2015

Easy way to learn the Arabic alphabets (Abjadiyah) for kids designed to be entertaining and colorful to engage the children while teaching them the basics or reading and writing the letters.

It has the following activities:

  • All the Arabic letters where a short song plays showing the letter pressed followed by a word that starts with that letter
  • A simple test that basically shows a picture and the child has to click on the appropriate letter that corresponds to the picture displayed
  • A game to connect the letters to their corresponding image
  • Connect the dots to draw the letters: a fun way to teach the child how to write the letters
  • Drag the letters to build the words
  • Memory game, that stimulates the childâ€™s memory and keeps them focused on the letters and their pronunciation.

Intended for: Kids ages 2-5

Designed by Karim Kadri, Developed by Obada Kadri

Qamoosi

Teaches basic reading skills to little kids in a fun, colorful way

Awladun May 23, 2015

Qamoosi teaches basic reading skills to little kids in a fun, colorful way. This game includes more than 80 words in seven different categories. This educational app is designed for kids ages two to seven.

In the main screen, select from seven categories: colors, animals, numbers, food, furniture, nature, and transportation. The aim of the game is to arrange the letters in the correct order to make the word. All letters are pronounced when touched. When the word is correctly completed, the whole word is pronounced and the kid can start coloring the picture.

Qamoosi teaches kids pronunciation, spelling, and word-picture association. An absolutely fun way to learn how to read!

Designed by Karim Kadri, Developed by Obada Kadri

Ashkal Wa Alwan

Easy way to learn the Arabic colors and shapes for kids

Awladuna Apr 16, 2013

Easy way to learn the Arabic colors and shapes for kids optimized for both phones and tablets. The interface is rather simple with shapes that can change colors, and example real life objects for those shapes

It has the following activities:

  • Learn: Contains different shapes where the child can change its color, both color and shape are pronounced as they appear.
  • Search game: Where the child should select the shape or the color that is being pronounced.
  • Matching game: The shapes need to be plugged into their places.
  • Draw: Teaches the child how to draw the basic shapes by following the guide.

Intended for: Kids ages 2-5
